document_data.name: Pineapple Tree
document_data.mainbody: '''Pineapples''' were a type of fruit, grown from trees of the same name, found in the Realms.
document_data.Availability:
Pineapples were known to grow in various places in the Realms:
* In [[southeast Faerûn]], pineapples were cultivated in northeastern [[Dambrath]], northern [[Estagund]], the northslope foothills of the [[Toadsquat Mountains]],{{Cite web/theedverse/2021-07-18 - Pineapple Producers in the Realms}} and in [[Luiren]]. In Luiren they were particularly known to grow in the tropical fruit plantations that stood between the cities of [[Beluir]] and [[Chethel]].
* Southeast Faerûn also sported wild pineapples throughout [[Veldorn]] and in the woodlands northeast of Veldorn.
* In [[southwest Faerûn]], pineapples were cultivated in parts of the [[Chultan Peninsula]] and in [[Lapaliiya]]. In the Chultan Peninsula, they were particularly found in [[Tashalar]]

Notable Users of Pineapples.Businesses: * [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|''Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue'']] sold dried pineapples in the catalogue's "Exotic" food section for 300 [[gold piece]]s per {{SI|1|lb|k|long=yes}}.<ref>
Notable Users of Pineapples.Regions & Settlements: * A favorite dish among the people of [[Shou Lung]]'s [[Ch'ing Tung Province]] was hot and spicy stewed [[snake]] served with pineapple.<ref>
